Version 2.0.93 - Fix iSpring LZ-String Position Tracking + Persist Location Format for Resume

Bug Fixes

  • Fix iSpring LZ-String SCORM position bar not updating: add iSpring.LMS detection (lowercase 'i') to findISpringPlayer and walk instance property chain to find currentSlideIndex() for real-time slide tracking
  • Fix iSpring Base64 / Rise 360 not resuming to furthest slide on refresh: persist lastKnownLocationFormat to localStorage so formatLocationValue uses vendor format ("slide_3", "section_1") instead of numeric ("3") after page reload
  • Restore lastKnownLocationFormat from localStorage on page load (tracking_core.php)
  • Persist lastKnownLocationFormat to localStorage on every lesson_location write (SCORM 1.2 + 2004)
  • Capture vendor location format in computeFurthestFromApi and retry loop (tracking_api_detection.php) so format is available even before first LMSSetValue

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.92: Fix resume format for iSpring/Rise 360 + Storyline retry backing store correction
  • v2.0.91: Fix Storyline resume + remaining parseInt issues for iSpring/Rise 360
  • v2.0.90: Fix position bar counter for iSpring/Rise 360 and Captivate
  • v2.0.89: Refactor SCORM logs: remove ~300 verbose logs, add 12 targeted position-tracking logs
